title: What is similar between the middle and modern ages? - Quora

response.answer_text: Human nature. Survival instincts have been civilized, social structures have progressed , no more serfs or slaves etc. But humans will be humans, they need to eat, shelter , make families and support their offspring. Watch Just Visting, u will love it : Just Visiting (film) - Wikipedia

Crowd think. They believed with absolute faith in what the people around them said was true as we do today. People were willing to die and kill for these truths. Only the truths they believed in were quite different now and then.
